review: He is good and actually visited for my mom, she visited to show for cholesterol. Doctor was listening to my mom's problems. He prescribed medicines which were helpful to my mom. In hospital there was some waiting time to consult the doctor. The suggestion and the explanation doctor gave to my mom about health issues was understandable to my mom. I will recommend the doctor to my family and friends. We were satisfied with the treatment given by the doctor.

He is Very friendly and answers our queries with the utmost patience. We visited for my mom for inconsistent pain around chest, He listens to the patients symptoms carefully and starts the treatment.I highly recommend Gopu Sir for Cardiac health issues.

Dr gobu is very humble and explains the procedure patiently.
He only saved my dad.
He did angioplasty for my dad.
Best cardiologist is Chennai

********* *******Very friendly encouraging person 
Handles patient  with care
Any day  I will recommend  Dr.gobu

We had visited the hospital and it was for my father in law. He had health issue of chest pain / ptca. Doctor was really good and friendly. He explained well. The patient was admitted in ICU as he was serious. He was admitted for 2 days. We are regularly going for check-up. I am satisfied with the treatment given. Doctor told to come again in July month. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends.
